name: IP_FLWSHT_REC
description: This table contains linking information associated with flowsheet records.

columns.name: FSD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the flowsheet data record.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the inpatient record associated with this flowsheet reading.

columns.name: RECORD_DATE
columns.description: The date these flowsheet readings were taken.

columns.name: DAILY_NET
columns.description: The daily net Intake/Output total for this date.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient.
